TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Expression`1<TDelegate> extends System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression
Public NotInheritable Class Expression(Of TDelegate) Inherits LambdaExpression
generic <typename TDelegate> public ref class Expression sealed : System::Linq::Expressions::LambdaExpression

span.span: The type of the delegate that the represents.

summary.span: 將強類型 Lambda 運算式表示為運算式樹狀架構形式的資料結構。

span.span: Represents a strongly typed lambda expression as a data structure in the form of an expression tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 lambda 運算式指派給變數、 欄位或參數的型別，編譯器會發出指示建立運算式樹狀架構。When a lambda expression is assigned to a variable, field, or parameter whose type is , the compiler emits instructions to build an expression tree. > [!NOTE] > 從 lambda 運算式，以輸入轉換`Expression`(`Expression(Of D)`在 Visual Basic 中) 存在，如果從 lambda 運算式給委派的類型轉換`D`存在。A conversion from a lambda expression to type `Expression` (`Expression(Of D)` in Visual Basic) exists if a conversion from the lambda expression to a delegate of type `D` exists. 不過，轉換可能會失敗，例如，如果 lambda 運算式主體的區塊。However, the conversion may fail, for example, if the body of the lambda expression is a block. 也就是說，委派和運算式樹狀架構有類似的行為方面多載解析。This means that delegates and expression trees behave similarly with regard to overload resolution. 運算式樹狀架構是 lambda 運算式的記憶體中的資料表示法。The expression tree is an in-memory data representation of the lambda expression. 透明和明確，運算式樹狀架構可讓 lambda 運算式的結構。The expression tree makes the structure of the lambda expression transparent and explicit. 如同您與任何其他資料結構，您可以使用運算式樹狀結構中的資料進行互動。You can interact with the data in the expression tree just as you can with any other data structure. 將運算式視為資料結構的能力可讓應用程式開發介面以接收使用者程式碼可以檢查、 轉換及以自訂方式處理的格式。The ability to treat expressions as data structures enables APIs to receive user code in a format that can be inspected, transformed, and processed in a custom manner. 例如，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]資料存取實作會使用此功能來轉譯 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式，可由資料庫所評估的運算式樹狀架構。For example, the [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] data access implementation uses this facility to translate expression trees to Transact-SQL statements that can be evaluated by the database. 許多標準查詢運算子中定義類別有一個或多個類型參數。Many standard query operators defined in the class have one or more parameters of type . 的是。The of an is . 使用或方法來建立物件。Use the or method to create an object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將代表 lambda 運算式做為可執行程式碼的委派形式，以及做為運算式樹狀架構形式的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to represent a lambda expression both as executable code in the form of a delegate and as data in the form of an expression tree. 它也會示範如何使用將回轉換成可執行程式碼運算式樹狀架構方法。It also demonstrates how to turn the expression tree back into executable code by using the method. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionT#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionT/CS/ExpressionT.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionT#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionT/VB/ExpressionT.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig instance !TDelegate Compile() cil managed

summary.span: 將運算式樹狀架構所描述的 Lambda 運算式編譯為可執行程式碼，並產生表示 Lambda 運算式的委派。

span.span: Compiles the lambda expression described by the expression tree into executable code and produces a delegate that represents the lambda expression.

returns.span: 型別的委派，表示由 所描述的已編譯 Lambda 運算式。

span.span: A delegate of type that represents the compiled lambda expression described by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生型別的委派`TDelegate`在執行階段。The method produces a delegate of type `TDelegate` at runtime. 執行該委派時，它會有的語意所描述的行為。When that delegate is executed, it has the behavior described by the semantics of the . 方法可以用來取得任何運算式樹狀架構的值。The method can be used to obtain the value of any expression tree. 首先，建立使用其主體為運算式的 lambda 運算式方法。First, create a lambda expression that has the expression as its body by using the method. 然後呼叫來取得委派，並執行委派，若要取得運算式的值。Then call to obtain a delegate, and execute the delegate to obtain the value of the expression. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何用來執行運算式樹狀架構。The following code example demonstrates how is used to execute an expression tree. [!code-csharp[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionT#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionT/CS/ExpressionT.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionT#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionT/VB/ExpressionT.vb#2)]

summary.span: 將運算式樹狀架構所描述的 Lambda 運算式，編譯成已解譯或已編譯的程式碼，並產生代表 Lambda 運算式的委派。

span.span: Compiles the lambda expression described by the expression tree into interpreted or compiled code and produces a delegate that represents the lambda expression.

returns.span: 委派，表示 所描述的已編譯 Lambda 運算式。

span.span: A delegate that represents the compiled lambda expression described by the .

summary.span: 產生代表 Lambda 運算式的委派。

span.span: Produces a delegate that represents the lambda expression.

returns.span: 委派，包含 Lambda 的編譯版本。

span.span: A delegate containing the compiled version of the lambda.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression`1<!TDelegate> Update(class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression body, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression> parameters) cil managed

summary.span: 建立類似這個運算式的新運算式，但使用提供的子系。

span.span: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.

summary.span: 如果所有子系都相同，則會傳回這個運算式。

span.span: If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.

returns.span: 如果未變更任何子系，則為這個運算式；否則為已更新子系的運算式。

span.span: This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
